items.title: Way-too-early 2026 Heisman watch: 15 players who could win the award
items.description: We size up next year's most likely candidates for college football's highest individual honor.

items.title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United ready to make January move for Semenyo
items.description: Bournemouth winger Antoine Semenyo is being lined up for a January move to Manchester United. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

items.title: Mahomes tears ACL as Chiefs' playoff hopes end
items.description: Patrick Mahomes suffered a torn ACL in the closing minutes of Sunday's loss to the Chargers, an MRI confirmed. "Don't know why this had to happen," he...

items.title: Source: Pack's Parsons believed to have torn ACL
items.description: The initial belief is that the Packers' Micah Parsons suffered a torn ACL, a source confirmed to ESPN.
